revision.text:
{{codepointer|Spawn}}'''A_Feathers'''
(no parameters)
If the actor is not dead this function will spawn 1 or 2 [[Classes:Feather|feather]](s). Otherwise it will spawn 5-8 feathers.
== Examples == Heretic [[Classes:Chicken|chicken]]'s pain state: Pain: CHKN D 5 A_Feathers CHKN C 5 [[A_Pain]] Goto See
